item.title: Pi with the vitruvian man
item.description: Introduction The symbol Pi may strike fear in the hearts of some people, but its basic function is simple, to calculate the sizes of round things. • Nasa uses Pi to calculate the size of planets outside our solar system. • GPS uses pi to calculate location on earth • Medical Researchers use pi t study the structure of the eye. Pi describes how long the border (circumference) of a circle is, compared to its height (diameter) So, if the diameter of a circle is 1, the border of a circle is Pi

item.title: Forbidden Love and Common Multiples
item.description: What are Factors and Multiples A factor is simply a number that fits into another In the above images, you can see that 2, 3 and 6, all fit into the number 6 A Multiple, is a number that can be produced by multiplying a number. In the above image, you can see that 2, 4, 6 and 8 are all multiples of 2 Prime factors The prime factors of a number allow you to break a number into its most basic pieces.
